nodes.bodyText: Generally, we don't want to override getSearchResultsUuids() and change the implementation. The right way to do this is to add the custom logic we need to the setupSearchParams() method (which is overridable for just this purpose). That way we only keep this logic in one place.

nodes.bodyText: It might be better to refactor things so this method is in BaseDao and can be used from both this class and the 2.2 and later implementation.

In this case, because the clinicalStatus is not a required field and we do not really have a way of representing it solely from the Obs, I would prefer that this implementation just return null. That is, if we do not know the right value, we shouldn't lie about knowing the right value (unless we're forced to guess).

we shouldn't lie about knowing the right value (unless we're forced to guess).

haha  😊
@ibacher , i think let me just entirely remove it out
I'd prefer this to be aliased to "c" for consistency. Also, this should go before the forEach block.
